role position in company: Chief, Reports Branch. Accounts Maintenance and Control

project and their description.Tiger team to resolve General Ledger pos: Identified and resolved General Ledger postings in DEAMS totaling $360B in accounting adjustments, enabling the first successful fiscal year-end close for 2012.
project and their description.Automated tool to identify duplicate obl: Developed an automated tool (with DFAS Europe) that identified duplicate obligations, allowing HQ USAFE to deobligate over $5M.
project and their description.Automated tool for USAFE financial metri: Collaborated with DFAS Limestone to develop an automated tool providing senior leaders visibility into USAFE unit compliance with GPC rules and regulations.
project and their description.GPC account issue resolution: Identified and resolved a problem with five GPC accounts rejecting during the automated interface process, eliminating rework and payment delays.
project and their description.ODA tool training: Provided remote training on the Open Document Analysis (ODA) tool, exceeding expectations and eliminating TDY travel costs.
project and their description.Suspense account elimination initiative: Identified and addressed suspense accounts, contributing to progress towards the Department of Treasury's mandate to discontinue them.
project and their description.TFMS reporting transition: Orchestrated the transition of reporting requirements for the Transportation Financial Management System (TFMS) workload from DFAS Omaha to Limestone and streamlined processes.
project and their description.Overaged invoice and backlog reduction: Reduced overaged invoice percentage by 19% and eliminated backlog of documents over 20 days old within three months.
project and their description.Employee Performance Plans: Established Employee Performance Plans linking employee performance to DFAS Strategies and Balance Scorecard goals.
project and their description.Ad-hoc data queries: Produced ad-hoc data queries using Louis II software to reduce man-hours for complex finance and accounting functions.
project and their description.DFAS consolidation: Coordinated with DFAS Denver and Omaha on the consolidation of the first geographically separated Defense Accounting Office into DFAS.
project and their description.Resource Advisor training: Provided training to over 400 base-level personnel on DFAS structure and funds management.
